<h3 id="X39846">X(39846) = PARALLELOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-WASAT TO 7th BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*((b^2+c^2)*a^6-2*(b^4+c^4)*a^4+(b^2+c^2)*(2*b^4-3*b^2*c^2+2*c^4)*a^2-(b^6-c^6)*(b^2-c^2))  :  :

<br>
<b>X(39846) = 3*X(51)-2*X(115) = 3*X(51)-4*X(39835) = X(148)-3*X(3060) = 9*X(373)-8*X(6722) = 3*X(568)-X(12188) = 4*X(620)-3*X(3917) = 2*X(1216)-3*X(15561) = 5*X(3567)-3*X(14651) = 3*X(5182)-2*X(11574) = 4*X(5447)-5*X(38750) = 4*X(5462)-3*X(38224) = 9*X(5650)-10*X(31274) = 3*X(5890)-X(9862) = 6*X(5892)-5*X(38739) = 6*X(5943)-5*X(14061) = 2*X(6055)-3*X(16226) = 4*X(9729)-3*X(34473) = 3*X(9730)-2*X(12042) = 4*X(10095)-3*X(38229) = 4*X(10110)-3*X(14639)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal parallelogic center of these triangles is X(6).</p>
<p>X(39846) lies on these lines: {2,39836}, {4,39837}, {6,39832}, {25,39849}, {51,115}, {52,2782}, {98,389}, {99,511}, {114,5562}, {125,39845}, {147,5889}, {148,3060}, {184,39839}, {185,2794}, {373,6722}, {542,1843}, {543,21969}, {568,12188}, {620,3917}, {671,21849}, {690,13417}, {1112,16278}, {1181,9861}, {1204,39841}, {1216,15561}, {1425,39844}, {1899,39833}, {2784,31732}, {2790,6751}, {3044,34986}, {3270,39851}, {3313,5026}, {3455,13366}, {3567,14651}, {3611,39850}, {4173,12830}, {5139,15063}, {5167,6033}, {5182,11574}, {5446,6321}, {5447,38750}, {5462,38224}, {5477,6467}, {5650,31274}, {5890,9862}, {5892,38739}, {5943,14061}, {6000,10722}, {6055,16226}, {6243,13188}, {7731,18331}, {9729,34473}, {9730,12042}, {9969,11646}, {10095,38229}, {10110,14639}, {10625,33813}, {10628,11005}, {10723,13598}, {11381,39838}, {11557,18332}, {11599,31757}, {12160,39820}, {12162,22505}, {13148,13166}, {13175,33586}, {13367,39854}, {13851,39847}, {14531,14981}, {14845,15092}, {15644,21166}, {16222,33511}, {16625,38664}, {16981,35369}, {17834,39803}, {18436,38743}, {21637,39840}, {21638,39843}, {21639,39848}, {21640,39852}, {21641,39853}, {21642,39855}, {21643,39856}, {21647,39858}, {21648,39859}, {21663,39860}, {31739,31839}, {34783,38744}, {36987,38736}</p>
<p>
X(39846) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {4, 39837}, {147, 5889}, {6243, 13188}, {7731, 18331}, {34783, 38744}<br>
X(39846) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (98, 389), (115, 39835), (671, 21849), (3313, 5026), (4173, 12830), (5562, 114), (6321, 5446), (6467, 5477), (10625, 33813), (10723, 13598), (11381, 39838), (11599, 31757), (11646, 9969), (12162, 22505), (16278, 1112), (18332, 11557), (31739, 31839), (39817, 52)<br>
X(39846) = complement of X(39836)<br>
X(39846) = crosssum of X(2) and X(9512)<br>
X(39846) = X(150)-of-orthic-triangle if ABC is acute<br>
X(39846) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (115, 39835, 51), (39833, 39842, 1899), (39839, 39857, 184)<br>
</p>
